trans-unit.source: Specifies the method to call when you register an assembly for use from COM; this enables the execution of user-written code during the registration process.
trans-unit.target: 指定当你注册以供从 COM; 程序集时要调用的方法这可以让你在注册过程中用户编写的代码的执行。

trans-unit.source: You can apply this attribute to methods.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将此特性应用于方法。

trans-unit.source: ComRegisterFunctionAttribute enables you to add arbitrary registration code to accommodate the requirements of COM clients.
trans-unit.target: ComRegisterFunctionAttribute 可以添加任意注册代码以适应的 COM 客户端的要求。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can update the registry using registration functions from the <xref:Microsoft.Win32> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以更新使用注册函数从注册表<xref:Microsoft.Win32>命名空间。</xref:Microsoft.Win32>

trans-unit.source: If you provide a registration method, you must also apply <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComUnregisterFunctionAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> to an unregistration method, which reverses the operations done in the registration method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你提供的注册方法，你还必须应用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComUnregisterFunctionAttribute?displayProperty=fullName>注销方法，以撤消注册方法中完成的操作。</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComUnregisterFunctionAttribute?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime calls the method with this attribute when its containing assembly is registered (directly or indirectly) with the [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)or through the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationServices.RegisterAssembly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 公共语言运行时将调用具有此属性的方法，其包含的程序集注册 （直接或间接） 与时[Regasm.exe （程序集注册工具）](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)或通过<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationServices.RegisterAssembly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationServices.RegisterAssembly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This attribute can be applied only to methods that have the following characteristics: - Scope: Any (public, private, and so on).
trans-unit.target: 此特性可以应用仅对具有以下特征的方法:-作用域︰ 任何 （公共、 私有的以及等）。

trans-unit.source: - Parameters: Accepts a single <xref:System.Type> parameter or a <xref:System.String> parameter type.
trans-unit.target: -参数︰ 接受单个<xref:System.Type>参数或<xref:System.String>参数类型。</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComRegisterFunctionAttribute"></xref> class.
